actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Veterans' Affairs (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-476.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Increases to $210,000 (now $100,000) the authorized expenditures for the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs pursuant to S. Res. 47, 93rd Congress for the purpose of conducting investigations.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs for inquiries and investigations.
